Get your site done.

 

Describe your site! In a few weeks, the ideal professional will deliver you project.
sections.defaultMessage: Hi! I would like to know how I could make my website:

sections.title: How it works

cards.title: Describe the purpose of your website
cards.description: Tell us what you need — from design to functionality. Attach any references or a Figma link to guide our developers.

cards.title: Connect to expert designers and devs
cards.description: Access a community of top-tier developers and designers that will take your vision and turn it into reality.

cards.title: Get your Site Done fast and cheap
cards.description: Once your site is live, enjoy full control without needing a developer - make edits and updates with no code!

project.title: I need a website for my startup that provides corporate education services.
I need a landing page to showcase Brazilian tech entrepreneurs' startups.
An institutional website for a nutritionist, with sections for about, news, recipes, and a call-to-action at the end.

sections.title: Benefits

cards.description: Full support from the GetSiteDone team via WhatsApp with real humans for any need from start to finish of your project.
cards.title: Full support from GetSiteDone team
Professional, fast and cheap
cards.description: Get your professional website up and running in just a few days. No lengthy processes or hidden fees.

cards.title: Community driven by excellence
cards.description: Access the creativity and expertise of over 4,500 developers and designers in our community.

tabs.title: Improve Core Web Vitals and PageSpeed
tabs.description: Gain more visibility by providing cutting-edge digital experiences that load instantly.

tabs.title: Seamless integration with databases
tabs.description: Enrich your visitors' experience by easily leveraging any third-party content and dynamic data.

tabs.title: Global edge for zero-wait speed
tabs.description: Deploy your site on a cutting-edge global infrastructure designed for instant scalability.

tabs.title: deco.pilot
tabs.description: AI assistant for code and content generation to help you complete your site faster.

tabs.title: Full control to edit in real-time
tabs.description: With deco.cx's CMS, you are equipped to update and edit your site as your business evolves - no developers needed!

tabs.title: Modern Technologies
tabs.description: Based on an efficient, secure, and future-proof set of technologies: Deno, Tailwind, JSX, TypeScript, and HTMX.

accordions.title: What does GetSiteDone deliver exactly?
accordions.description: GetSiteDone connects you with the ideal developer and designer for your project, overseeing the development to ensure quality. We understand your demand and select a high-level professional from our community with the technical capacity and quality to execute your project.

accordions.title: deco.cx and GetSiteDone
accordions.description: GetSiteDone has partnered with deco.cx to bring cutting-edge technology, currently utilized by major Brazilian companies such as Osklen, Casa & Video, and Zee.Dog, to businesses and individuals seeking high-performance, scalable, and customizable websites without requiring programming knowledge.Deco.cx is a front-end platform that bridges the gap between basic no-code website builders and complex full-code setups. It empowers businesses of all sizes to create high-performance, fully customized, AI-native web experiences. This open-source platform integrates top-tier infrastructure, hosting, CMS, a visual editor, and a code editor, providing a comprehensive solution for web development.

accordions.title: Values and Payments
accordions.description: Payment can be made via credit card. Once your website is ready, the initial monthly fee is U$9 for up to 50 thousand monthly page views. From this number of views, U$8 is charged for every 10 thousand page views in addition to the basic monthly fee.

accordions.title: How do delivery times work?
accordions.description: Delivery times vary depending on the complexity of the project. In general, they vary from 1 week to 4 weeks. We will be responsible for keeping you updated throughout the project development stages.

accordions.title: What is the relationship between whoever requests a website and the developer or designer?
accordions.description: From the moment the developer is chosen for your project, GetSiteDone asks for authorization to share contact between the parties in case of questions about the project. Communication is done via Whatsapp. Throughout the entire project, our assistants will monitor the development of the project and will be available for any needs.
